ffffs008 Isotope E
Rarity: Super Rare
Looking for Inventory Management? Please Login w/ "Remember Me?" option selected.
Isotope E
This object is not equipment. It is a special light object with the following effect: "After revealing forces, you may move this object to your sideline. If you do, this object has: "SIDELINE ACTIVE: At the beginning of the game, you may replace a character on your starting force with a character from your sideline of the same name and point value. If you do, KO this object."
15 Points
Figure Errata
OLD: EQUIP: Any. UNEQUIP: Drop. EFFECT: After revealing forces, you may move this object to your sideline. If you do, this object has: "SIDELINE ACTIVE: At the beginning of the game, you may replace a character on your starting force with a character from your sideline of the same name and point value. If you do, KO this object." Light Object.

While not always useful, it dies have some great uses. Buggest one to me, if you build an F4 team and put 100 point FFFF Doom you can switch him for FFCC Doom. Still an F4 theme team. Few uses but can be very good when it comes up, at least imo. Not that I think it's worth 15. Probably only gonna use it with High Evolutionary.
February 25, 2021
TheSupreme
[QUOTE=jtallday;12116637]Hardly useless. Doesn't break theme as this doesn't resolve until after theme has been determined. Also the main set Vulture has Scientist keyword and us the same points as prime Vulture so that's plenty useful. Not as generally good as the Time Platform but not terrible.[/QUOTE] I say borderline useless because the restrictions of "same name and point value" make it nigh impossible to use in modern. Vulture is only going to be around for a few more months and there's maybe a handful of other characters who can take advantage of it at most. If it were equal or less points it would be exponentially more useful.
